main.title: About Kartavya
main.subtitle: A student-led social organization at IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
main.description: Kartavya is committed to promoting social welfare and community development in and around the IIT (ISM) Dhanbad campus. We strive to make a positive impact by addressing various social issues and providing a platform for meaningful community service.

initiatives.title: Educational Programs
initiatives.description: Providing tutoring, computer literacy classes, and scholarships for underprivileged children.

initiatives.title: Health Awareness
initiatives.description: Organizing health camps, awareness programs, and free medical check-ups for the community.

initiatives.title: Environmental Care
initiatives.description: Conducting tree-planting drives and promoting eco-friendly practices in the community.

photos.title: Annual Day Celebration 2024
photos.description: Students performing at the annual day celebration

support.title: Support & Recognition
support.description: Kartavya is powered by generous donations from alumni, faculty members, and supporters. Our dedicated team of volunteers works tirelessly to create positive change in our community.
